Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game class where game is created and run from.
    Author:
    Denis Murphy, Ian Murphy & Bill O'Keeffe

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addPlayer()
      Method that allows an admin to add new player into an array so that the game can begin.
      private int adminMenu()
      Method that display a menu that displays the admin menu and returns the option that they choose.
      private int assetMenu()
      Method that prints the menu choices and returns the value to the assetRun() method so that the chosen option can be carried out
      private void buyDomGas()
      Method that allows the player to buy from the domestic gas market
      private void buyDomOil()
      Method called when player wants to purchase a barrel from the domestic oil market
      private void buyForGas()
      Method that allows the purchase of gas barrels from the foreign market.
      private void buyForOil()
      Method where player can purchase from the foreign oil market
      private void buyOilRig()
      Method that allows the buying of Oil Rigs and it's placement
      private void buyRefinery()
      Method where the player buys and places their refinery.
      private void buyStation()
      Method where the player buys and places their Gas Station
      private int calcDifference(int redVal, int blackVal)
      Method that calculates and returns the difference between the two dice.
      private void checkColHits(int black)
      Method that takes in the value of the black die and checks to see if there are any hits in the Player's grid.
      private void checkNews(int red, int black)
      Method that takes the values of the dice rolled and checks if they are doubles or not.
      private void checkRowHits(int red)
      Method that takes in the value of the black die and checks to see if there are any hits in the Player's grid.
      private void chooseGo()
      Method that picks who the starting player is if players aren't satisfied to go with the order in which players were inserted.
      void createGameObjects()
      Method that creates all objects needed within the game.
      private void doLessLikely()
      Method that checks what the news id of the less likely news event is and carries out it's instructions.
      private int domMarketMenu()
      Method to print the menu so the player can choose which oil market he/she buys from.
      private void doMoreLikely()
      Method that checks what the news id of the more likely news event is and carries out it's instructions.
      private void editPlayer()
      editPlayer() A method that allows access to the player ArrayList were if a player player exists the player name in the ArrayList can be edited
      private void forceSell(Player player)
      Method that gets called during the news event phase in the case of a player not having enough money to complete the action that the news card calls for.
      private int forMarketMenu()
      Method to print the menu for the gas market
      private void listPlayers()
      Method used to display the players that are currently in the array list.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method, starts the game off by calling the run method.
      private int mainMenu()
      Method that returns an int to the run() method that calls other functions to interact with the game.
      private int marketMenu()
      Method that displays the main market menu and returns the user's option to the marketRun() method.
      private void marketRun()
      Method that runs the market phase, this phase allows players to buy and sell gas and oil barrels on both the domestic and foreign markets.
      private void newEconomyType(int diceRoll)
      Method to change the economy card, the green die is rolled and the value it returns is passed into the method and then the economy is changed based on what the current economy card specifies it should be.
      private int playerMenu()
      Method to display a menu to a player and to return his/her choice
      private int prodMenu()
      Menu that's linked to the runProduction() method, the value returned here determines whether the production menu starts.
      private void productionPhase()
      Method that carries out the start of the production phase.
      private void removePlayer() 
      private void run()
      Method used to kick-start the game by calling mainMenu() where players can be created + edited and the game can be started.
      private void runAsset(int red, int black)
      Method that's responsible for handling the users choice of what building they want to buy in the asset phase and also launches the method that will allow the player to sell the assets he/she has on the corresponding row and column represented by the dice.
      private void runProduction()
      Method that signifies the end of the market phase and waits for input from a user to kick start the production phase of the player's turn.
      private void runSpecialAsset()
      Method that gets called at the start of the game and allows the player to buy and place assets inside the grid.
      private void sellAssets(int red, int black)
      Method where players are allowed to sell assets that they own that are contains within cells that can be represented by the dice rolls that occured earlier.
      private int specialAssetMenu()
      Method that prints a menu and allows the player to choose which building he/she wants to purchase before the game begins proper.
      private void specialRound()
      Start's the special round where players get to buy and place assets.
      private void winCheck()
      Method that will perform the check to see if a player has the 750million required to win a game, if the player does it will launch a new round of phases and once all players bar the player claiming victory has completed each phase it will declare a winner.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method, starts the game off by calling the run method.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • createGameObjects

        public void createGameObjects()
        Method that creates all objects needed within the game.

      • run

        private void run()
        Method used to kick-start the game by calling mainMenu() where players can be created + edited and the game can be started.

      • mainMenu

        private int mainMenu()
        Method that returns an int to the run() method that calls other functions to interact with the game.
        Returns:
        Player's selection.

      • adminMenu

        private int adminMenu()
        Method that display a menu that displays the admin menu and returns the option that they choose.
        Returns:
        The admin's choice

      • addPlayer

        private void addPlayer()
        Method that allows an admin to add new player into an array so that the game can begin. Once in create players, it doesn't leave until all players are created.

      • editPlayer

        private void editPlayer()
        editPlayer() A method that allows access to the player ArrayList were if a player player exists the player name in the ArrayList can be edited

      • listPlayers

        private void listPlayers()
        Method used to display the players that are currently in the array list.

      • removePlayer

        private void removePlayer()

      • playerMenu

        private int playerMenu()
        Method to display a menu to a player and to return his/her choice
        Returns:
        Player's choice

      • chooseGo

        private void chooseGo()
        Method that picks who the starting player is if players aren't satisfied to go with the order in which players were inserted.

      • runSpecialAsset

        private void runSpecialAsset()
        Method that gets called at the start of the game and allows the player to buy and place assets inside the grid.

      • specialAssetMenu

        private int specialAssetMenu()
        Method that prints a menu and allows the player to choose which building he/she wants to purchase before the game begins proper.
        Returns:
        The users choice

      • specialRound

        private void specialRound()
        Start's the special round where players get to buy and place assets.

      • runProduction

        private void runProduction()
        Method that signifies the end of the market phase and waits for input from a user to kick start the production phase of the player's turn.

      • prodMenu

        private int prodMenu()
        Menu that's linked to the runProduction() method, the value returned here determines whether the production menu starts.
        Returns:
        Player's input.

      • productionPhase

        private void productionPhase()
        Method that carries out the start of the production phase.

      • newEconomyType

        private void newEconomyType(int diceRoll)
        Method to change the economy card, the green die is rolled and the value it returns is passed into the method and then the economy is changed based on what the current economy card specifies it should be.
        Parameters:
        diceRoll - Value to be searched for.

      • calcDifference

        private int calcDifference(int redVal,
                 int blackVal)
        Method that calculates and returns the difference between the two dice.
        Parameters:
        redVal - Value of red die
        blackVal - Value of black die
        Returns:
        The difference between the two or '0'.

      • checkNews

        private void checkNews(int red,
             int black)
        Method that takes the values of the dice rolled and checks if they are doubles or not. If they are doubles then a new method is called based on whether the double's are 1's, 3's or 6's.
        Parameters:
        red - Red Die roll value
        black - Red Die roll value

      • checkRowHits

        private void checkRowHits(int red)
        Method that takes in the value of the black die and checks to see if there are any hits in the Player's grid. If the grid slot contains a building the correct action for that building is carried out. Doubles checked in this method!
        Parameters:
        red - The value of the red die roll.

      • checkColHits

        private void checkColHits(int black)
        Method that takes in the value of the black die and checks to see if there are any hits in the Player's grid. If the grid slot contains a building the correct action for that building is carried out. Doubles not checked in this method!
        Parameters:
        black - The value from the black die roll.

      • doMoreLikely

        private void doMoreLikely()
        Method that checks what the news id of the more likely news event is and carries out it's instructions. On completion, it then replaces more likely card with the current less likely event and then selects a new less likely card from the array list.

      • doLessLikely

        private void doLessLikely()
        Method that checks what the news id of the less likely news event is and carries out it's instructions. On completion, it adds the less likely card back into the deck and grabs the next available card to be the new less likely news card.

      • forceSell

        private void forceSell(Player player)
        Method that gets called during the news event phase in the case of a player not having enough money to complete the action that the news card calls for.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who has to sell the assets.

      • runAsset

        private void runAsset(int red,
            int black)
        Method that's responsible for handling the users choice of what building they want to buy in the asset phase and also launches the method that will allow the player to sell the assets he/she has on the corresponding row and column represented by the dice.
        Parameters:
        black - The Value of the black die roll (col)
        red - The value of the red die roll (row)

      • assetMenu

        private int assetMenu()
        Method that prints the menu choices and returns the value to the assetRun() method so that the chosen option can be carried out
        Returns:
        The players choice.

      • buyStation

        private void buyStation()
        Method where the player buys and places their Gas Station

      • buyRefinery

        private void buyRefinery()
        Method where the player buys and places their refinery.

      • buyOilRig

        private void buyOilRig()
        Method that allows the buying of Oil Rigs and it's placement

      • sellAssets

        private void sellAssets(int red,
              int black)
        Method where players are allowed to sell assets that they own that are contains within cells that can be represented by the dice rolls that occured earlier.
        Parameters:
        black - The value of the black dice, representing the column index
        red - The value of the black dice, representing the row index

      • marketRun

        private void marketRun()
        Method that runs the market phase, this phase allows players to buy and sell gas and oil barrels on both the domestic and foreign markets.

      • marketMenu

        private int marketMenu()
        Method that displays the main market menu and returns the user's option to the marketRun() method.
        Returns:
        The user's choice.

      • forMarketMenu

        private int forMarketMenu()
        Method to print the menu for the gas market
        Returns:
        The players choice

      • buyDomGas

        private void buyDomGas()
        Method that allows the player to buy from the domestic gas market

      • domMarketMenu

        private int domMarketMenu()
        Method to print the menu so the player can choose which oil market he/she buys from.
        Returns:
        The players choice

      • buyDomOil

        private void buyDomOil()
        Method called when player wants to purchase a barrel from the domestic oil market

      • buyForGas

        private void buyForGas()
        Method that allows the purchase of gas barrels from the foreign market.

      • buyForOil

        private void buyForOil()
        Method where player can purchase from the foreign oil market

      • winCheck

        private void winCheck()
        Method that will perform the check to see if a player has the 750million required to win a game, if the player does it will launch a new round of phases and once all players bar the player claiming victory has completed each phase it will declare a winner. If player doesn't have 750million or chooses not to declare the next player in line is allowed to start a turn.
